thread.title: BRIEF-GRG Banking Equipment's Unit Wins Bid For Video Surveillance Project For 200 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GRG Banking Equipment's Unit Wins Bid For Video Surveillance Project For 200 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-grg banking equipment's unit wins bid for video surveillance project
reuters) - grg banking equipment co ltd

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - GRG Banking Equipment Co Ltd :
* SAYS UNIT WINS BID FOR VIDEO SURVEILLANCE PROJECT FOR 200 MILLION YUAN ($31.58 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2tpRSRe Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3340 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
